document.full_text: al qaeda confirmed the death of osama bin laden on friday in an internet message that vowed revenge on the united states and its allies, including pakistan, according to a statement issued by the islamist militant group.
document.title: al qaeda confirms bin laden death and vows revenge
lines_and_colors: al qaeda confirmed the death of osama bin laden on friday in an internet message that vowed revenge on the united states and its allies, including pakistan, according to a statement issued by the islamist militant group.
